trans-unit.source: Returns the bitwise NOT of the value.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the bitwise NOT of the value.

target.mrk: Returns the bitwise NOT of the value.

trans-unit.source: Bit operations are performed as 32-bit integers.

seg-source.mrk: Bit operations are performed as 32-bit integers.

target.mrk: Bit operations are performed as 32-bit integers.

trans-unit.source: Remember hex notation can be used for numbers.

seg-source.mrk: Remember hex notation can be used for numbers.

target.mrk: Remember hex notation can be used for numbers.

trans-unit.source: Remember that in 2's-complement notation, BitNOT() is functionally equivalent to adding 1 and negating the result.

seg-source.mrk: Remember that in 2's-complement notation, BitNOT() is functionally equivalent to adding 1 and negating the result.

target.mrk: Remember that in 2's-complement notation, BitNOT() is functionally equivalent to adding 1 and negating the result.

trans-unit.source: Also remember that NOT changes a 0 bit to 1 and vice-versa.

seg-source.mrk: Also remember that NOT changes a 0 bit to 1 and vice-versa.

target.mrk: Also remember that NOT changes a 0 bit to 1 and vice-versa.

trans-unit.source: Assign a Local variable the bitwise NOT operation of 5.

seg-source.mrk: Assign a Local variable the bitwise NOT operation of 5.

target.mrk: Assign a Local variable the bitwise NOT operation of 5.
